articles.title: U.S. CDC report more severe allergic reactions to COVID-19 vaccines - Devdiscourse
articles.description: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) said on Wednesday it is carefully monitoring allergic reactions to the coronavirus vaccines from Pfizer Inc and Moderna Inc and urged individuals who had a serious reaction not to get the second dose. …

articles.author: Francesco Guarascio
articles.title: EU may soon approve new use of Pfizer vaccine increasing doses by 20% -source - Reuters
articles.description: The European drugs regulator could soon give the go ahead for an extra sixth dose to be extracted from Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine vials, an EU official told Reuters on Wednesday, lifting the number of available shots at a time when supplies are short.
